Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Offensive Opportunity

Beanbag.display_help: Fires a single non lethal rubber bullet that can seriously Disorient a target. Deals little damage and takes a long time to reload, but renders most targets unable to attack for a good while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.
Defensive Opportunity

Buckshot.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of Buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You quickly take aim and are more accurate, more deadly and able to shoot a longer distance for a short while.

M30_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Flamethrower.display_help: Spews forth a cone of flames from underneath the barrel of your assault rifle, setting foes on fire. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Extreme(DoT) Recharge: Slow
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire and you are burning.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Incinerator.display_help: Sprays a target with accelerant from your flamethrower, igniting it and causing extreme damage over time. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Incinerator.display_target_help: You have been ignited! You are burning.

Full_Auto.display_help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
